reviewText: This is a nice first step to learn Wu Style Tai Chi. Jiang presents the forms so that it is easy to follow and learn.

This is the best example of Wu style I've seen.  The teacher, Jiang Jian-ye is incredibly fluid and graceful.  The tape shows the form twice from two angles and then shows each movement individually with  instructions.  There is a little section at the end where Jiang explains  the basic principles.  I just love how he does this form!
